text:
(1) Outerbridge Crossing site (Staten Island): The beginnings of construction on the new bridge linking Tottenville, Staten Island, with Perth Amboy, New Jersey. The view is across Arthur Kill toward New Jersey.

P. L. Sperr

(2) Operations on the bridge site, east of Arthur Kill Road.

September 21, 1926

P. L. Sperr

(3) A side track for bringing up materials on the bridge-construction site.

P. L. Sperr

September 21, 1926

text:
(1)
Outerbridge Crossing site: Shown is the area over which was thrown across the Outerbridge Crossing; the view being
westward from Arthur Kill Road, Staten Island.
P. L. Sperr

(2)
On the east side of Arthur Kill Road.
P. L. Sperr

(3)
Looking east across the bridge site from the shore of
Arthur Kill toward Arthur Kill Road.
P. L. Sperr

September 21, 1926

P. L. Sperr

text:
Outerbridge Crossing: The south side of the bridge spanning Arthur Kill and linking Tottenville, Staten Island, with Perth Amboy, New Jersey. The three views are from Staten Island and were taken the same day.

title: Bridges - Outerbridge Crossing - [Linking Tottenville, Staten Island to Perth Amboy, New Jersey.]

text:
(1)
Outerbridge Crossing: A view north from the foot of Lee Avenue, Tottenville, Staten Island. The bridge connects Staten Island with Perth Amboy, New Jersey.
April 23, 1929

P. L. Sperr

(2)
Another view, at a later date, looking up Arthur Kill.
June 25, 1935

P. L. Sperr

(3)
An additional view, at a still later date.
June 6, 1936

P. L. Sperr

text:
Pleasant Plains Boulevard, west from about Goethals Avenue, showing the Outerbridge Crossing and Beauvais Post Circle (the bridge plaza).

August 24, 1930

P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Pleasant Plains Boul - Goethals Avenue

text:
Outerbridge Crossing: The span across Kill Van Kull connects Staten Island to New Jersey. It is nearly two miles in length, and is 142 feet above the high water mark.

About 1930.

Ewing Galloway.
(Not a dry mount item).
title: Bridges - Outerbridge Crossing site - [Kill Van Kull - Tottenville, Staten Island - Perth Amboy, New Jersey.]

text:
(1) and (2).

Outerbridge Crossing: A distant view across the swamps from the Page Street viaduct. The bridge spans Arthur Kill and connects Staten Island with Perth Amboy, N.J. The two views were taken the same day.

May 6, 1930

P.L.Sperr
title: Bridges - Outerbridge Crossing - [Arthur Kill - Tottenville, Staten Island - Perth Amboy, New Jersey.]
